resources.string: Change direction. Can you see the euglena react?
Try to get a euglena in the ball!
Notice the direction tracking and velocity.
If carried out of bounds, the ball resets!
Tapping the playing field passes the ball.
If euglena are about to go out of bounds, pass the ball to remain in play!
Now try to get the ball into the goal.
You can carry the ball or pass it into the goal.
Notice how the score changed! 3 points for carrying the ball in, 1 point for passing it in.
Take turns playing! Each player gets 30 seconds. After the countdown expires, switch the other player.
